ygData.subject: Re: Undocumented Everfrost Location
ygData.msgSnippet: Intresting... You mean under the ice, wheras you take the small hole in the ice then swim for it? Which direction? I would like to go check that out sometime.
ygData.messageBody:
Intresting...

You mean under the ice, wheras you take the small hole in the ice then swim
for it? Which direction? I would like to go check that out sometime. Do you
think that the cave will become a new zone area, or just a cave under the
water? And the Necro you say you saw, was he an NPC PK or just a normal NPC?
Did he scrowl at you?


>From: "Whitmore, Lance" <lwhitmore@...>
>Reply-To: EverQuest@onelist.com
>To: "'EverQuest@onelist.com'" <EverQuest@onelist.com>
>Subject: [EverQuest] Undocumented Everfrost Location
>Date: Tue, 29 Jun 1999 14:52:23 -0400
>
>Has anyone been to the hidden cave area located in Everfrost.� You have to
>swim under the ice to get to it ( you must have atleast the skill of 75 in
>swimming�or Endure Beathing make it).� None of the maps that ive seen,
>include this area.� I've traveled there before and i found� the maze�to be
>mostly empty, shy a few ice boned skeletons.� There was a named human
>necromancer there, but�i have since forgotten his name.� I cannot verfiy
>that the cave was empty after that, for i didn't explore beyond the Necro.�
>I do believe that the cave extended further; though, i cannot verfiy.�
>There
>was also a small portal like structure that was guarded by two ice bones.�
>If you step inside you are turned back around, (like the skeleton cave in
>the Tox Forest, which will soon lead to the future�Paineel zone) i asume
>that this aswell will be a future zone point.�
>�
>I will check it out again and report in.� Check it out, who knows what
>purpose or loot the necro might contain.� Maybe hes guarding something
>else..
>�
>Lance
